form.label: UI MEM, Linux Memory and Swap Usage
form.description: User Interface for the MEM monitor

search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.frameID" | sort limit=0 "MEM.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.hostname"

| tstats max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "MEM.hostname" AS hostname "MEM.frameID" AS "frameID" | stats dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("memused_MB") AS memused_MB $statsmode$("memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT $statsmode$("memfree_MB") AS memfree_MB $statsmode$("memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT $statsmode$("memtotal_MB") AS memtotal_MB $statsmode$("buffers_MB") AS buffers_MB $statsmode$("buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT $statsmode$("cached_MB") AS cached_MB $statsmode$("cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT $statsmode$("active_MB") AS active_MB $statsmode$("active_PCT") AS active_PCT $statsmode$("inactive_MB") AS inactive_MB $statsmode$("inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT $statsmode$("swapused_MB") AS swapused_MB $statsmode$("swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT $statsmode$("swapfree_MB") AS swapfree_MB $statsmode$("swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT $statsmode$("swaptotal_MB") AS swaptotal_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_MB") AS swapcached_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by frameID, hostname | sort limit=0 frameID,hostname | fields frameID, hostname, memused_MB, memused_PCT, memfree_MB, memfree_PCT, memtotal_MB, buffers_MB, buffers_PCT, cached_MB, cached_PCT, active_MB, active_PCT, inactive_MB, inactive_PCT, swapused_MB, swapused_PCT, swapfree_MB, swapfree_PCT, swaptotal_MB, swapcached_MB, swapcached_PCT | foreach *_MB [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 0)] | foreach *_PCT [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 2)]

lu.li: memused : Total amount of physical RAM used
memfree : Total amount of physical RAM left unused by the system
memtotal: Total amount of physical RAM
buffers : The amount of physical RAM, used for file buffers
cached : The amount of physical RAM, used as cache memory
active: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, that is in active use. This is memory that has been recently used and is usually not reclaimed for other purposes
inactive: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, that are free and available. This is memory that has not been recently used and can be reclaimed for other purposes
swapused : The total amount of swap used
swapfree : The total amount of swap free
swaptotal : The total amount of swap available
swapcached : The amount of swap, used as cache memory

search.query: eval memfree_MB=round(memfree_MB,0) | eval memused_MB=round(memused_MB,0) | eval memtotal_MB=round(memtotal_MB,0) | eval buffers_MB=round(buffers_MB,0) | eval cached_MB=round(cached_MB,0) | eval active_MB=round(active_MB,0) | eval inactive_MB=round(inactive_MB,0) | $memmode$ | fields - _time | rename memfree_MB As "memfree (MB)", memused_MB As "memused (MB)", memtotal_MB As "memtotal (MB)", buffers_MB As "buffers (MB)", cached_MB As "cached (MB)", active_MB As "active (MB)", inactive_MB As "inactive (MB)" | rename memfree_PCT As "memfree (%)", memused_PCT As "memused (%)", buffers_PCT As "buffers (%)" , cached_PCT As "cached (%)", active_PCT As "active (%)", inactive_PCT As "inactive (%)" | fields frameID,hostname,$memfilter$

eval swapfree_MB=round(swapfree_MB,0) | eval swapused_MB=round(swapused_MB,0) | eval swaptotal_MB=round(swaptotal_MB,0) | eval swapcached_MB=round(swapcached_MB,0) | $memmode$ | fields - _time | rename swaptotal_MB As "swaptotal (MB)", swapused_MB As "swapused (MB)", swapfree_MB As "swapfree (MB)", swapcached_MB As "swapcached (MB)" | rename swapused_PCT As "swapused (%)", swapfree_PCT As "swapfree (%)", swapcached_PCT As "swapcached (%)", | fields frameID,hostname,$swapfilter$

| tstats max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | $charting$ | timechart $span$ useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("memused_MB") AS memused_MB $statsmode$("memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT $statsmode$("memfree_MB") AS memfree_MB $statsmode$("memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT $statsmode$("memtotal_MB") AS memtotal_MB $statsmode$("buffers_MB") AS buffers_MB $statsmode$("buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT $statsmode$("cached_MB") AS cached_MB $statsmode$("cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT $statsmode$("active_MB") AS active_MB $statsmode$("active_PCT") AS active_PCT $statsmode$("inactive_MB") AS inactive_MB $statsmode$("inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $memmode$ | fields _time, $memfilter$

| tstats max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | $charting$ | timechart $span$ useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("swapused_MB") AS swapused_MB $statsmode$("swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT $statsmode$("swapfree_MB") AS swapfree_MB $statsmode$("swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT $statsmode$("swaptotal_MB") AS swaptotal_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_MB") AS swapcached_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $memmode$ | fields _time, $swapfilter$
